channel.title: Changing Exp Rate
channel.description:
Hi, I want to change my experience rate per hit in the Devolution Source V7. I searched for some tuts but i didn't find them.. Can anyone tell me in what file i can edit it?
Thank you very much
~One Living

item.title: Changing Exp Rate
item.dc:creator: @i_bl33d_i i bl33d i
item.description:
@i_bl33d_i wrote:

Just go into client, and search for exp, pretty simple from there, you’ll know when you find it, it’ll say the exp in your server. check what the exp rate is before doing it though, much easier.

Read full topic
